content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
This place is amazing! Love the vibe. It's very casual and fun. Amy, our server, was such a pleasure. She cooked the meats perfectly and took great care of us. I bring all my friends to King Chang and will continue to do so! Thanks Amy and team!!
